name: Monster In The Making
description:
“You wake up in an unfamiliar field. Where are you? Why are you here? How did you get here? To get the answers you seek, you have to navigate your way through a strange forest with illuminating lights and flimsy creatures that speak in riddles, but beware of the darkness that follows.”

Monster In The Making is a 1st person adventure/horror game created by us, Krissy and Kaja, for our final year project. 

The game was inspired by research about nothingness, oblivion and morality.
